text: Yuvina Parthavi is an Indian child actress who has appeared in films and commercials. She was introduced as a child actress in AVM Productions television serial Uravukku Kai Koduppom (2011), before making a breakthrough in films portraying a young girl. And also acted in web series As I'm Suffering From Kadhal. ==Career== Yuvina was introduced as a child actress in AVM Productions television serial Uravukku Kai Koduppom (2011) by director Bhuvanesh, who met Yuvina and her father Mahesh while on a tour. Her performance in the serial received acclaim, with producer M. Saravanan noting the success of the serial had "a lot to do with" Yuvina. In 2014, she started appearing in films and her role as Nallasivam's granddaughter in Veeram, where she featured in scenes alongside Ajith Kumar was well received by critics. Subsequently she was signed on to appear in roles in Linguswamy's production Manjapai where she played a young girl who bonds with an elderly man, as well as in a one scene appearance in AR Murugadoss's Kaththi, playing a girl at the airport cared for by Samantha.http://www.indiaglitz.com/channels/tamil/events/51368.html The same year, she also played a full length role in Athithi as a kidnapped chuhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1M1n41Plh0 ==Filmography== *All films are in Tamil, unless otherwise noted. {| class="wikitable sortable" st#le="background:#f5f5f5;" |- st#le="background:#B0C4DE;" !
